projects.name: Menos
projects.used_technology: Node.js, Express.js, SquareSpace API, Airtable API
projects.description: Webstore for B2B and B2C shopping with secure direct payment system

projects.name: DareMe
projects.used_technology: MongoDB Atlas, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, JWT, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap
projects.description: A social media platform where users dare each other to challenges for profit.

projects.name: Candidate Matcher
projects.used_technology: PostgreSQL, Ruby on Rails, React.js, Google Civics API, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap
projects.description: An app to help users find candidates that match their political views on different issues and find their current reprensentatives by address.

projects.name: Crime Stats
projects.used_technology: PostgreSQL, Ruby on Rails, Vanilla JavaScript, FBI Crime Data API, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap
projects.description: A graphical website that shows detailed crime data of each states from 1979 to present, seperated by crime type and compared to national average.

projects.name: Quicker Picker Upper
projects.used_technology: Ruby on Rails, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap
projects.description: A web game that user is on the mission to clean up the messes created by kids. The user has to find the proper tool to clean up the right mess.
